page.title: 02THE CIVIC COMPLEX
page.content: The Civic Complex consists of the Civic Hall,a police station,a fire station,an old peoples' home and some bungalows.It is very convenient with all the main buildings close together and sited near to local transport. The Civic Hall(1972) is used for meetings,conferences,discos,shows and receptions.It has a very big car-park which is sometimes used for driving lessons. The fire station(1973) is handy, being close to the Ring Road.It has a practice tower behind it. The police station(1978) has cells at the back. There are lots of bungalows for old people who can help themselves. There is an old peoples' home on Richmond Road where old people go when they cannot cope for themselves any longer.
